m_szDocTitle: Wind-driven electric power generation system - MDL Enterprises, LLC
m_szDocSumamry: Wind-driven electric power generation system United States Patent 7868476 Abstract: A system generating electrical power from wind includes a cowling to capture wind and directs it into a tubular housing. At least one fixed helical vane can be integrated into the inner surfaces of the tubular housing in a spiral, adapted to further direct the captured wind into a spiraled air flow and focus the wind directly onto electrical generator fan blades located near an exhaust of the system. A generator cone can be mounted at the front of the generator or fan blades facing air passing through the tubul
